name: Cranberry Nut Jello Salad
instructions: Boil for five minutes the cranberries, sugar and 1 1?2 cups of water. Set aside. Dissolve Jello in 2 cups boiling water, add and pineapple. Combine with cranberry mixture. Pour into mold and pecans chill. Can use drained pineapple juice in place of some of the water.
